docs.title: Summary of Docker Images
docs.text:
Containers

Jump off point for all docs of all container projects.

Hugo

For building static websites using Hugo.

MkDocs

For building static websites using MkDocs.

Packer

For building templated VMs using Hashicorp Packer.

Packer Plus

For building templated VMs using Ansible/Packer/etc.

PowerCLI

For running PowerShell and VMware PowerCLI scripts.

Tanzu

For interacting with Kubernetes/Tanzu clusters.

Terraform

For managing VMs/OVFs/etc on VMware vSphere.

The Works

All/Most of the above in a single image.

docs.text:
• Getting Started with Containers

  • Getting Started with MkDocs
  • Getting Started with Packer Plus
  • Getting Started with Packer
  • Getting Started with PowerCLI
  • Getting Started with Tanzu

docs.title: Containers
docs.text: Overview of Containers project and jump off point for individual container documentation.by Grumpy DumptyMaintainer | January 1970 - Present

docs.title: Hugo
docs.text: Hugo container for building static websites.by Grumpy DumptyMaintainer | January 1970 - Present

docs.title: MkDocs
docs.text: MkDocs container for building project docs-as-code (i.e. this set of sites).by Grumpy DumptyMaintainer | January 1970 - Present

docs.title: Packer
docs.text: Bare minimum Packer container for building Packer VM templates/OVFs/etc.by Grumpy DumptyMaintainer | January 1970 - Present

docs.title: Packer Plus
docs.text: Packer container with additional tools (ansible/etc) for building Packer VM templates/OVFs/etc.by Grumpy DumptyMaintainer | January 1970 - Present

docs.title: PowerCLI
docs.text: PowerShell container with PowerCLI modules for vSphere/etc.by Grumpy DumptyMaintainer | January 1970 - Present

docs.title: Tanzu
docs.text: Container for working with Kubernetes clusters (including Tanzu K8s clusters) using kubectl / kubectl vsphere / kubectx / kubens / helmby Grumpy DumptyMaintainer | January 1970 - Present

docs.title: Terraform
docs.text: Container for working with Terraform, specifically Packer VMs templates/OVFs/etc.by Grumpy DumptyMaintainer | January 1970 - Present

docs.title: The Works
docs.text: Container with all of the utilities from the specialised containers (see above).by Grumpy DumptyMaintainer | January 1970 - Present
